News.headline: Club News: Fans Forum With Glenn Tamplin
News.page_title: Club News: Fans Forum With Glenn Tamplin
News.URL_keywords: Club News: Fans Forum With Glenn Tamplin
News.short_description: Here at the Daggers we are hosting a fans forum in our Clubhouse in which Glenn Tamplin will be in attendance.
News.description:
On Wednesday 9th November at 7:30pm the club will be hosting a fans forum in the Stadiums Clubhouse.

This will give fans an opportunity to ask any questions they might have regarding the new investment and for Glenn to answer any of the fans questions.
